metadata.title: CVE-2024-24246 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap Buffer Overflow vulnerability in qpdf 11.9.0 allows attackers to crashthe application via the std::__shared_count() function at/bits/shared_ptr_base.h.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24246` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf29 - 11.5.0-1ubuntu1.1
qpdf - 11.5.0-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qpdf package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.5.0-1ubuntu1.1').
